#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int T,N;
	const int mod = 1000000;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--){
		unsigned long long int sum=0, area=0,temp,i;
		cin>>N;
		temp = N;
		for(i=1;i<=N;i++){
			sum=sum+ i*i;
			area = area + i*i*temp*temp;
			temp--;
		}
		sum = sum % mod;
		area = area % mod;
		cout<<sum<<" "<<area<<endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
